trans-unit.source: Provides the look and feel property settings to a top-level workflow in a design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Gir egenskapsinnstillingene utseendet til en på øverste nivå arbeidsflyt i et miljø med utformingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Workflow themes define the look and feel of a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Arbeidsflyten oppsett definere utseendet av en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: This includes any background styles, foreground styles, fonts, and icons defined for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter alle Bakgrunnsstiler forgrunnen stiler, skrifter og ikonene som er definert for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: An ambient theme contains the default display properties for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En omkringliggende tema inneholder standard visningsegenskapene for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: It provides settings to be used across the entire design surface (for example, the grid, background and foreground colors, read-only designer color, and so on).
trans-unit.target: Det gir innstillingene skal brukes på tvers av hele utformingsoverflaten (for eksempel i rutenettet, bakgrunns-og forgrunnen, skrivebeskyttet designer farge, og så videre).

trans-unit.source: It can use either user-selected values or the values from the operational system.
trans-unit.target: Det kan bruke brukervalgte verdiene eller verdiene fra operativ systemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the ambient theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref> med som det omsluttende temaet er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient back color on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfarge for omkringliggende utformingsoverflaten en arbeidsflyt.

trans-unit.source: When you set the BackColor property, it negates the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackgroundBrush%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt egenskapen bakgrunnsfarge, den opphever den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackgroundBrush%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackgroundBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient background color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: The default is white.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er hvit.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes displayed on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende velgeren brukes til å fylle grafiske former vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> value that represents the background brush of the workflow on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> verdi som Representer bakgrunnen velgeren for arbeidsflyten på en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient bold font setting for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende fet skrift-innstillingen for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> value that determines whether the text on the workflow design surface is bold.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> verdi som bestemmer om teksten på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten er fet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient border width for objects that are placed onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter den omsluttende kantlinjetykkelsen for objekter som er plassert på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the border width of objects placed on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer kantlinjetykkelsen for objekter som er plassert i utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient brush associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende velgeren tilknyttet kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som er knyttet til kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient color associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende fargen på kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien som er tilknyttet kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient pen associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende pennen tilknyttet kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> property value and its width set to 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdi og bredden satt til 1.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> value that is associated with commented designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> verdien som er tilknyttet kommentert utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient size settings for activity designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innstillingene for omsluttende størrelsen for aktivitet utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"></xref> enumeration value that determines the size of activity designers on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som bestemmer størrelsen på aktiviteten utviklere på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerSize"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws grayscales.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om omkringliggende tema knyttet til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten tegner gråtoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws grayscales; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de omkringliggende temaet tilknyttet arbeidsflyten tegner gråtoner; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws rounded shapes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om omkringliggende tema knyttet til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten tegner avrundet former.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws rounded shapes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de omkringliggende temaet tilknyttet arbeidsflyten tegner avrundet figurer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ambient theme associated with the workflow design surface draws shadows.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om omkringliggende tema knyttet til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten tegner skygger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ambient theme associated with the workflow draws shadows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis de omkringliggende temaet tilknyttet arbeidsflyten tegner skygger; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient brush associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende velgeren knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient color associated with an object that you drags onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende fargen knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien som er knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient pen associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende pennen knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value and its width set to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BorderWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder et nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdi og bredden satt til den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BorderWidth%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with an object that you drag onto the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> knyttet til et objekt som du drar til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende skriftinnstillingene for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the ambient font settings for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> som representerer omkringliggende skriftinnstillingene for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriftnavnet på omkringliggende for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ambient font name for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer skriftnavnet omkringliggende for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient fore color property for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukes de omkringliggende forgrunnsfarge egenskapen for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient fore color for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som representerer den omsluttende forgrunnsfarge for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient foreground brush for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende forgrunnen velgeren for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ForeColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder et nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ForeColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> value that represents the ambient foreground brush.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende forgrunnen velgeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient foreground pen for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende forgrunnen pennen for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>med fargen som er satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdien, bredden satt til 1, og den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.DropIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> value that represents the ambient foreground pen.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende forgrunnen pennen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende høyden og bredden på symboler på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the ambient height and width of glyphs on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende høyden og bredden på symboler på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient grid color for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende rutenettfargen for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the grid color for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer rutenettfargen for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient size of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende størrelsen på rutenettet skal vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the height and width of the grid to display on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> verdi som representerer høyden og bredden i rutenettet skal vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient grid style for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen omkringliggende rutenett for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref> value that represents the dash style for the grid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"> </xref> verdi som Representer bindestreker stilen for rutenettet.

trans-unit.source: The default setting is <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardinnstillingen er <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional initialization tasks for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> class that are not performed by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utfører initialisering av flere oppgaver for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> klasse som ikke er utført av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> returns `true`, Initialize sets all <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> properties to the values defined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A>returnerer `true`, initialisere angir alle <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>egenskapene til verdiene som er definert av operativsystemet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient brush settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende velgeren innstillingene for store rutenett på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som er forbundet med store rutenettet på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient pen settings for major grids on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter de omsluttende penneinnstillinger for store rutenett på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>med fargen som er satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A>egenskapsverdien, bredden satt til 1, og den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the major grid on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> som er forbundet med store rutenettet på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient margin settings for the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter innstillingene for omkringliggende bunnmarg for arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the margin settings on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer marginnstillingene på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient pen settings for minor grids on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter de omsluttende penneinnstillinger for underordnede rutenett på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color calculated based on the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres det en <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>beregnet basert på gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A>egenskapsverdien, den bredden satt til 1, og den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.GridColor%2A> med fargen</xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the minor grid on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> som er forbundet med mindre rutenettet på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> when the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration changes.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> når verdien for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref> opplisting endringer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> specifies the source of ambient theme properties for classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>Angir kilden for omkringliggende Temaegenskaper for klasser som arver fra <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: The two possible sources are the operating system and the designer-specified settings.
trans-unit.target: To mulig kilder er operativsystemet og angitt designer-innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value to which the setting was changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som innstillingen ble endret.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with read-only items displayed on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende velgeren brukes til å fylle grafiske former som er knyttet til skrivebeskyttet elementene som vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> object with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ReadonlyIndicatorColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>objekt med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ReadonlyIndicatorColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.ReadonlyIndicatorColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som representerer velgeren knyttet til skrivebeskyttet elementer på arbeidsflyt for en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende fargen for skrivebeskyttet elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende fargen for skrivebeskyttet elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient color for selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende fargen for valgte elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient color for read-only items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som Representer omkringliggende fargen for skrivebeskyttet elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient foreground brush used to fill graphical shapes associated with selected items displayed on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter den omsluttende forgrunnen velgeren brukes til å fylle grafiske former som er knyttet til valgte elementene som vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush> object with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder et nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres en <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>objekt med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that represents the brush associated with read-only items on the workflow on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> som representerer velgeren knyttet til skrivebeskyttet elementer på arbeidsflyt for en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient foreground pen settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende forgrunnen penneinnstillinger for valgte elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) by default it will return a `Pen` with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A> property value and its width set to 1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) som standard returneres en `Pen` med fargen satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A>egenskapsverdi og bredden satt til 1.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the foreground of selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> tilknyttet forgrunnen for de valgte elementene på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir mønsterfargen omkringliggende for elementer som du velger på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A> is not null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set SelectionPatternColor, SelectionPatternColor will dispose of any resources used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A> and set it to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A>er ikke null referanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) når du angir SelectionPatternColor, SelectionPatternColor vil fjerne alle ressursene som brukes av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A>og sett den til `null` (`Nothing`).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternPen%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ambient pattern color for items that you select on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdi som representerer fargene som omkringliggende mønsteret for elementer du velger i utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient pen settings for the pattern associated with selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter de omsluttende penneinnstillinger for mønsteret knyttet til valgte elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If this property contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), by default it will return a <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> with its color set to the current <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternColor%2A> property value, its width set to 1, and its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen inneholder en nullreferanse (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), som standard returneres det <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>med fargen som er satt til gjeldende <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternColor%2A>egenskapsverdien, bredden satt til 1, og den <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.SelectionPatternColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Pen>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> associated with the pattern of selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> som er forbundet med mønsteret for de valgte elementene på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient size of a selected item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende størrelsen på et merket element på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the ambient property settings for selected items on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer egenskapsinnstillingene omsluttende for valgt elementer på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the workflow design surface displays configuration errors.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten viser konfigurasjonsfeil.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow design surface is to display configuration errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten skal vise konfigurasjonsfeil; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the workflow design surface displays designer borders.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten viser designer kantlinjer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow design surface displays designer borders; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflyten utformingsoverflaten viser designer kantlinjer; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grids will be shown on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenett skal vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grids will be displayed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om rutenett skal vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text quality to display on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstkvaliteten skal vises på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: TextQuality allows you to determine whether the text displayed on a workflow design surface, and all its child designers, is anti-aliased or aliased.
trans-unit.target: TextQuality kan du finne ut om teksten som vises på utformingsoverflaten en arbeidsflyt, og alle de underordnede-utviklere er anti-aliasing eller alias.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliased text provides higher quality text display, while aliased text requires fewer resources to maintain.
trans-unit.target: Anti-Aliasing teksten gir tekstvisning høyere kvalitet, mens alias teksten krever færre ressurser å beholde.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"></xref> that specifies the text quality settings to use on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality"> </xref> som angir teksten kvalitetsinnstillingene som skal brukes på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> uses the theme settings of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> bruker temainnstillinger for operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> uses theme settings of the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> bruker tema innstillingene for operativsystemet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringsinnstillingene for omsluttende for vannmerket bilder på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies the ambient alignment settings for watermark images on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref> som angir justeringsinnstillingene for omsluttende for vannmerket bilder på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omkringliggende banen til bildet som skal vises som vannmerke på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: Use WatermarkImagePath to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Bruk WatermarkImagePath for å knytte et bilde som vannmerkebilde for en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If WatermarkImagePath is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set WatermarkImagePath, WatermarkImagePath disposes of any resources used by WatermarkImagePath and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis WatermarkImagePath ikke `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) når du har angitt WatermarkImagePath, WatermarkImagePath disposes for ressurser brukes av WatermarkImagePath og angir verdien til `null` (`Nothing`).

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ambient path to the image to display as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder omkringliggende banen til bildet som skal vises som vannmerke på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ambient image to associate with the workflow design surface as its watermark.
trans-unit.target: Henter omkringliggende bildet for å knytte til utformingsoverflaten arbeidsflyten som vannmerket.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> to associate an image as a watermark image for a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>å knytte et bilde som vannmerkebilde for en arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when you set <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> disposes of any resources used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> and sets its value to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>ikke `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) når du angir <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>disposes av ressursene som brukes av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>og angir verdien til `null` (`Nothing`).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to use as a watermark on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> skal brukes som et vannmerke på arbeidsflyt utformingsoverflaten.
